definition: straight or circular throwing-knife used by ninja and samurai (loanword from Japanese 手裏剣 shuriken)
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
